trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_000<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var> in Porta Praetoria finds you well.

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_001<tab>An honor and a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! What brings you all the way to Porta Praetoria on this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_010<tab>Fight for the Ala Mhigan Resistance, what else? I was but a child when I fled the city with my parents, and I remember little of life before the Garleans came...but I still see her streets in my dreams.

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_011<tab>Those memories are what brought me here. Though a part of me never thought we'd make it this far! I mean, by Rhalgr, we're within spitting distance of Cotter's citadel! We're almost there. We're almost home...

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_020<tab>Protect and serve Ala Mhigo, what else? I was but a child when I fled the city with my parents, and I remember little of life before the Garleans came...but I still see her streets in my dreams.

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_021<tab>Those memories are what brought me here. Though a part of me never thought we'd make it this far! I mean, by Rhalgr, we actually beat the bastards! Zenos and the lot of them! It's like something out of a song...

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_030<tab>Porta Praetoria? Our last camp before Ala Mhigo, and the point of entry to Castrum Abania. Though I reckon you know that since you came through there.

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_031<tab>This passage between the Peaks and the Lochs has always held strategic importance, but it was the Garleans who went and built a bloody fortress right on top of it.
TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_032<tab>Though it's our fortress now, heh heh, along with all her supplies! We've more than enough to sustain us through our assault on the city!

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_040<tab>Porta Praetoria? The last stop before Ala Mhigo, and the point of entry to Castrum Abania. Though I reckon you know that since you came through there.

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_041<tab>This passage between the Peaks and the Lochs has always held strategic importance, but it was the Garleans who went and built a bloody fortress right on top of it.

TEXT_REGGYR3PORTAPRAETORIA_00402_THORNEDCROW_000_042<tab>I suppose we ought to thank 'em, eh? It'll come in handy should we need to repel another invasion. But let's all hope it doesn't come to that any time soon.
